item.title: Owner
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

LOL.

runescapepkserver:

Bro if you don’t know this just play servers don’t try to code… But it’s located in your Char files… change rights to 4.

Your stupid. In davidscacpe rights go up to 2. To make yourself owner you find my name “David” and replace it with yours in the following files:

Commands.java, login.java

[quote=“John459, post:3, topic:299749”]Your wrong. For 508s it is not located in the character files. Don’t insult people if you don’t even know the correct answer.

Open login.java and search for:

if (p.username.equals("

You will see something that looks like this:

if (p.username.equals("####")) { p.rights = 2; }
Change the name located at #### to your character’s username. Their is also a tutorial for people new to 508s. View it here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,347830.0.html[/quote]

And thats only for admin.

Read full topic
